title.narrative: Yunnan Technical and Vocational Education and Training Project

description.narrative: To improve the quality and relevance of technical and vocational education and training to produce skills that respond to the labormarket demand, contributing to Yunnan's economic development during China's 12th Five-Year Plan period.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Project Agreement Schedule, Section I.A.2. | Description :The Project Implementation Entity shall enter into aSubsidiary Loan agreement with project schools | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement Schedule, Section I.B.2. | Description :The Project Implementation Entity shall maintain thefollowing organizations: provincial project management office, provincial expert team, school implementation units | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement Schedule, Section I.D.1. | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall cause each ofthe Project Schools to implement the Project in accordance with the ECOP, and in accordance with sound environmental practices andstandards | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :Interim Unaudited Financial reports | Frequency :SemiAnnual
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :Project audit reports | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :Submit Project Progress Report | Frequency :SemiAnnual

title.narrative: Number of project management training events offered
Number of people participating in curriculum development training
Number of school-industry collaboration and sector-specific industrial advisory committees established
Number of teachers trained in student centered teaching methodology
Number of relevant research or policy briefs prepared
Number of professional training programs with competency-based standards developed
Percentage of teachers/instructors trained in industry attachments
Number of high-quality modular and competency-based curricula (CBT)
Percentage of instructors with both skills certificate and academic qualification
Percentage of graduates finding initial employment in specialties in which they were trained
Percentage of practical units implemented in the new training programs
Percentage of graduates obtaining both skills certificate and diploma
